formats.description: List of formats that are available for this texture set

atlas.description: `true` is texture contains an atlas. Viewer should turn off anisotropic filtering for atlases to avoid sampling artifacts. default=`False`

examples.title: Texture set definition (desktop: jpg+dds)
examples.description: For a mesh with `material.resource=888`, JPEG will be at `/layers/0/nodes/888/textures/0` and DDS at `/layers/0/nodes/888/textures/1`

examples.title: Texture set definition with ETC2 compresses image (Mobile: jpg+ktx-etc2)
examples.description: JPEG texture will be at `/layers/0/nodes/{nodes[i].material.resource}/textures/10`. Same texture in KTX format will be at  `/layers/0/nodes/{nodes[i].material.resource}/textures/11`

examples.title: PNG bundled texture on 3rd slot of bundle at  `/layers/0/nodes/{resource}/textures/1`
Advanced material definition where all textures are part of the same bundles (so 1 texture query per node)
